'''Tangara''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Tangara is the military leader of the Wahaki, responsible for the raids against foreigners encroaching on the tribe's territory.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
* [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)
* [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/)
|none            = 
|other           =
* You can pickpocket the [Construct Command Scroll](/constructCommandScroll/) from him, or convince him to give it to you with  [Metaphysics](/metaphysics/) 5 / [Bluff](/bluff/) 6 / [Athletics](/athletics/) 4.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/) / [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/): He can be eliminated by manipulating the construct he bought.
[Category:Ori o Ko朝ki characters](/categoryOriOKoikiCharacters/)
